name: Heart Fragment Book Two: Belief Fragments (Shannon & Lana)
name_original: Heart Fragment Book Two: Belief Fragments (Shannon & Lana)
description:
Can you collect all of the fragments, solve the mysteries, and find your way to a happy ending?  What happens when fantasy is stripped away, leaving only belief behind?

Your established bond with your best friend Shannon makes you hesitant to open up to her about your struggles. Not out of any desire to hide things - you just don't want Shannon to be dragged into a potentially dangerous situation.

Meanwhile, you haven't seen Lana in ten years; not since the death of your mother. Lana looks a bit different now with her dyed pink hair but she's still the same caring girl with a bit of a wild side that you remember from your youth.

Book Two focuses on the reality of things, dealing with matters at a surface level. If you strip away fantasy and leave only belief in those around you behind, what answers will you be able to find?

  • Full routes for Lana & Shannon
  • A step closer to the finale
  • More voiced scenes
  • 20 new CGs
  • New good endings (and bad endings)
Installation Instructions:
  1. For optimal compatibility, please update to the latest version of Heart Fragment BEFORE completing the steps below. Trying to load the DLC from an older version may block access to the new content.
  2. Download the zip file.
  3. Extract the zip by right clicking to find extraction options.
  4. Open the folder for the base game of Heart Fragment and navigate to the folder titled "game". It should contain files titled "hfm.rpa" and "hft.rpa". 
  5. From your unzipped DLC folder, there will two files titled "hfbel.rpa" and "hfbes.rpa" - move these into the same folder so that they are next to "hfm.rpa" and "hft.rpa" from step 3.

If you run into any issues, please don't hesitate to comment below for tips and troubleshooting advice!
